meanings.definition: The quality of being able to exist or work together without conflict.
meanings.sent1: The compatibleness of their personalities made them great friends.
meanings.sent2: The compatibleness of the colors in the painting created a harmonious effect.
meanings.sent3: The party's theme was 'Mismatch Day,' but everyone ended up accidentally matching, showcasing their compatibleness.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork displayed a remarkable compatibleness, like pieces of a puzzle fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The orchestra's performance was a beautiful display of musical compatibleness.

meanings.definition: The state of being suitable or well-matched.
meanings.sent1: The compatibleness of the furniture with the room's decor was impressive.
meanings.sent2: Their compatibleness in interests made them a perfect pair for the project.
meanings.sent3: The chef's experiment with unusual flavor combinations surprisingly resulted in a dish of perfect compatibleness.
meanings.sent4: The siblings' closeness showed a deep compatibleness in their personalities.
meanings.sent5: The compatibleness of their skills allowed them to excel in their collaboration.
